data.text: @MadeinCanada18 @cityburlington @MariannMeedWard I couldn't agree more. What happens to everyone that's passing through the city and stops for dinner, gas, does some shopping? How confusing will that get. You need to meet and follow the @fordnation lead.

@MadeinCanada18 @cityburlington @MariannMeedWard My thoughts exactly! COB, you’re not “above” the top doctors. Follow them and drop mandates. You’re in for challenges and aggression if you try to force a continuing mandate.
@cityburlington Nobody cares. It’s over! The pandemic theatre is over. It was over 22months ago but you all just had to cling on to it
@cityburlington Maybe you guys should consider bumping up your meeting. These decision should be made before March 21 @MariannMeedWard
